amendment.description: To provide certain limitations and prohibitions on the development and deployment of the Total Information Awareness program.

vote.text: Amendment SA 59 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 59 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Wyden. (consideration: CR S1412-1416; text: CR S1412-1413) To provide certain limitations and prohibitions on the development and deployment of the Total Information Awareness program.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 59 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 59 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Wyden.
